alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Knott; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:52AM EDT until July 29 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Knott County in southeastern Kentucky... West central Floyd County in southeastern Kentucky... East central Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 915 AM EDT. * At 852 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Daisydell, or 14 miles east of Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Decoy around 855 AM EDT. Evanston around 900 AM EDT. Vail around 905 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Handshoe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
